contactInfo.title: Contact
extraInfo: *References are issued upon the request of the interested party.

welcome.title: Hi!
content: I have a degree in International Business with great pleasure for logistics operations at national and international level, through different modes of transportation, in order to achieve optimal operations that generate greater value for enterprises and professional growth.

career.title: My Career
content: The experience in logistics operations allows me to take decisions and implement solutions in order to meet the established requirements. I am in the best disposition to complement knowledge with new learning and ideas that allow me to develop myself in an international environment.

content.school: Instituto Tecnológico y de Estudios Superiores de Monterrey - Campus Central de Veracruz

content.school: Instituto Tecnológico y de Estudios Superiores de Monterrey - Campus Central de Veracruz
Colegio de Bachilleres del Estado de Veracruz

summary: Direct communiction with: Customers (Importers and/or Exporters), Customs Brokers, Shipping Companies, Coloaders, Correspondent Agents, Carriers.
General activities: Customer Service, cost estimate for payment to suppliers, pre-billing and billing, pricing, report generation, document delivery management.

Operational monitoring: CargoWise One (C1) sofware, sending and/or receiving of pre alerts, generate insurance policies, booking request, review of requirements prior to release merchandise to final consignee, exchange of information and/or documentation with Customs Broker and Corresponding agents, support to generate EUR1 doc, review of BL´s, arrival confirmations, coordination of inland shipments.
Knowledge of: Customs Law, LIGIE, Incoterms, RRNA, Air transport coordination
Direct communiction with: Customers (Importers and/or Exporters), Customs Brokers, Shipping Companies, Coloaders, Correspondent Agents, Carriers.
General activities: Customer Service, costing and pre-billing, payment request to suppliers, pricing, reports, physical clousure of operational files.

Operational monitoring: sending and/or receiving of pre alerts, booking request, review of requirements prior to release merchandise to final consignee, exchange of information and documentation with Customs Brokers, Feedback to Correspondent Agents, Inland transportation requests, review of BL´s, arrival confirmations in destination.
Knowledge of: Customs Law, LIGIE, Incoterms, RRNA, Air transport coordination.
